info.name: Sketchy Ball
info.description: Sketchy Ball, drawing a pencil sketch type scene

renderpass.code:
// 356 Characters by me, fixed to work without the #define trick.
// This can be shorter by using Fabrice's code, but I wanted to play around with it
#define T texture(iChannel2, vec3//
void mainImage (out vec4 o, in vec2 u)
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = u+u-R,
         S = fract(U /= R.y * .2);
    S = U - S + S*S*(3.-S-S);
    S = ( T(ceil(iTime*20.), S+.5)/32.).xy -.5 ) *.05;
    S += U *= .2;
    float v = .5+.5*T(iTime, S*5.)).r,
          l = length(S)-.5;
    o = vec4(.98,.93,.82,1)
      - texture(iChannel0, U).r *.05
      - smoothstep(.015, -.01,
                   max(min(l, length((S+.35)/vec2(3,1))-.2), -l))*v*v;
}/*


// 335 Characters by Fabrice

#define T texture(iChannel2, vec3//
#define mainImage(o,u)                        \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,                  \
         U = (u+u-R)/R.y,                     \
         S = fract(U*5.);                     \
    S = U*5.-S + S*S*(3.-S-S);                \
    S = U + ( T(ceil(iTime*20.), S+.5)/32.).xy -.5 ) *.05;\
    float v = .5+.5*T(iTime, S*5.)).r,                    \
          l = length(S)-.5;                               \
    o = vec4(.98,.93,.82,1)                               \
      - texture(iChannel0, U).r *.05                      \
      - smoothstep(.015, -.01,                            \
                   max(min(l, length((S+.35)/vec2(3,1))-.2), -l))*v*v/*


// 366 Characters by me

#define mainImage(o,u)\
vec2 U= iResolution.xy, S;\
U= (u+u-U)/U.y;\
S= fract(U*5.);\
S= U*5.-S + S*S*(3.-S-S);\
o= vec4(.98,.93,.82,1) - texture(iChannel0, U).r*.05;\
U+= texture(iChannel2, vec3(floor(iTime*20.)/32., (S+.5)/32.)).xy*.05-.025;\
o-= smoothstep(.015, -.01, max(min(length(U)-.5,\
length(U/vec2(3,1)+vec2(.1,.35))-.2), .5-length(U)))*\
pow(.5+.5*texture(iChannel2, vec3(iTime, U*5.)).r, 2.);


*/
renderpass.name: Image
